subject: Re: Keyboard mappings and keyboard layouts
msgSnippet: ... white these ... I certainly agree that colour would be helpful.  But the grid PDF is based on a spreadsheet full of lookups (so I could quickly regenerate
messageBody:
--- In Read_Alphabet@yahoogroups.com, "Ted Larson Freeman"
<freeman@...> wrote:
> I like the colors! It's helpful.
>
>
> On Jan 8, 2008 9:20 AM, Moira O'Brien <mj@...> wrote:
> > This is true - but how many people only ever print in black &
white these
> > days?

I certainly agree that colour would be helpful. But the grid PDF is
based on a spreadsheet full of lookups (so I could quickly regenerate
it) and automated colouring was looking a bit too difficult for the
time available. I'll have another bash at it if time allows.

Besides, I usually print in black and white! (Most of our household
computer kit dates back to some time around the Napoleonic wars.)
